text.text: As you use your tools, they take damage. Once all of their durability is gone they break. :(
To fix that you need to repair your tool. You don't need to wait until it breaks, you can repair it at any time!

Repairing is easy. Put the tool into a tool station or forge and add items equivalent to the head of the tool. If the tool's head is made of multiple parts you can use each of those materials. Repairing with multiple materials at the same time grants bonus durability repaired.
You can also repair your tools while deep under the earth or adventuring far away from your base.
